nodes.text: The Deaons, also known by the derogatory name "Gimmers," were a sentient species native to the planet Ord Gimmel. They made up 42% of the planet's population, and were the primary labor force in its factories.
The Deaons were descended from humans. Over time, however, they evolved yellow skin and longer, more spindly limbs.
Deaons spoke their mind publicly and often. As a result, their culture appeared to lack "social niceties" and manners, though the Deaons were also unusually forgiving.
